name: Time Master
description:
Time Master is a fantasy themed time manipulation puzzle game. Rewind time and collaborate with your past self to solve dozens of hand-crafted puzzles. Explore a variety of solutions to each puzzle and find the one that allows you to finish it fast enough to earn a 3 star rating.

The rules are simple:
- Gather all crystals to activate the teleportation circle and head there to complete the level.
- You can rewind time at most one per trial. You can retry a level as many times as you like.
- Once you have rewound time, you can freeze / unfreeze the past timeline.
- Unlock various achievements as you progress, and ultimately the "Time Master" achievement after earning 3 stars in all levels.

Intrigued? Wishlist the game!
